00039 #include "CmdInsertMaterial.h"
00040 #include "SceneModel.h"
00041 #include "tgf.h"
00042 #include "TMaterial.h"
00043 #include "Trace.h"
00044 #include "TShapeKit.h"
00045 
00046 
00047 CmdInsertMaterial::CmdInsertMaterial( TShapeKit* shapeKit, TMaterial* material, SceneModel* model, QUndoCommand * parent )
00048 : QUndoCommand("InsertMaterial", parent), m_shapeKit(shapeKit), m_previousMaterial(0),m_material(material), m_pModel( model )
00049 {
00050         Trace trace( "CmdInsertMaterial::CmdInsertMaterial", false );
00051         
00052         if( m_shapeKit == 0 ) tgf::SevereError( "CmdInsertMaterial called with NULL TShapeKit" );
00053         if( m_material == 0 ) tgf::SevereError( "CmdInsertMaterial called with NULL TMaterial" );
00054         m_material->ref();      
00055     m_previousMaterial = dynamic_cast< TMaterial* >( m_shapeKit->getPart( "material", false ) );
00056 }
00057 
00058 CmdInsertMaterial::~CmdInsertMaterial()
00059 {
00060         Trace trace( "CmdInsertMaterial::~CmdInsertMaterial", false );
00061     m_material->unref();
00062 }
00063 
00064 void CmdInsertMaterial::undo()
00065 {
00066         Trace trace( "CmdInsertMaterial::undo", false );
00067 
00068     m_shapeKit->setPart( "material", NULL );
00069         m_pModel->RemoveCoinNode( m_row, *m_shapeKit );
00070 }
00071 
00072 void CmdInsertMaterial::redo( )
00073 {
00074         Trace trace( "CmdInsertMaterial::redo", false );
00075     m_shapeKit->setPart( "material", m_material );
00076     m_row = m_pModel->InsertCoinNode( *m_material, *m_shapeKit );
00077 }
